venue.name: Waltham, MA. At the Forefront Conference Center.

item.description:
The second annual bSa BIMSmart Summit is coming to Waltham!
Cost: $75.00 members of bSa
$150.00 non-members* (All non-members will receive a complimentary membership with the bSa. Value $75.00) All monies collected through National.

Lunch is included. We will have a panel discussions and presentations on the state of BIM in US and abroad, COBie, BIM & Insurance, and a working BIM Process / Implementation Charette to name a few.

FM Global, Stiles Construction, BR+A, ACAI Technologies and Precision Point are Sponsors and the event will be marketed in Boston, through our bSa Interest Groups and on the bSa National site.

For more information or to register, go here: http://www.buildingsmartusa.com/
item.name: BIMSmart Summit
